valid: For the period 00:00 (UTC) on Wed 4 Feb 2026 to 00:00 (UTC) on Thu 5 Feb 2026
general_synopsis: New low expected north Biscay 972 by 1800 Wednesday

Viking.text:
Wind
In southwest, southeasterly 7 to severe gale 9. In northeast, southeasterly 4 to 6, occasionally 7 in south.
Sea state
In southwest, very rough or high. in northeast, rough or very rough.
Weather
In southwest, sleet or snow. In northeast, mainly fair.
Visibility
In southwest, moderate to very poor. In northeast, moderate or good.

Gale warning
Issued:
21:54 (UTC) on Tue 3 Feb 2026
Southeasterly severe gale force 9 continuing
